MonsterTrait.Name: Fey Ancestry
MonsterTrait.Text: The shadow fey has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The shadow fey's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can cast the following spells innately, requiring no material components. 3/day: misty step (when in shadows, dim light, or darkness only)

MonsterTrait.Name: Sneak Attack (1/turn)
MonsterTrait.Text: The shadow fey forest hunter does an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack that had advantage, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the forest hunter that isn't incapacitated and the forest hunter doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

MonsterTrait.Name: Sunlight Sensitivity
MonsterTrait.Text: While in sunlight, the shadow fey has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

MonsterTrait.Name: Traveler in Darkness
MonsterTrait.Text: The shadow fey has advantage on Intelligence (Arcana) checks made to know about shadow roads and shadow magic spells or items.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The shadow fey makes two ranged attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Rapier
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Longbow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.
